description: This Dart file defines a Flutter widget called RecipeCard, which displays a brief overview of a recipe including its image, title, description, rating, and favorite status. It also handles navigation to a detailed recipe page on tap and allows toggling the favorite status.

classes.name: RecipeCard
classes.description: A widget that displays a brief overview of a recipe, including image, title, description, rating, and favorite button, with navigation to a detail page on tap.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the RecipeCard widget, showing image, title, description, rating, and favorite toggle button.
